display_long_description:
🌌 Moon Portal — Everything Begins with a Portal

Not an app. Not a game. A gateway.  
Moon Portal is your immersive launcher into infinite realities — a spatial interface that transforms your room into a bridge between worlds.

Ever dreamed of living on a spaceship, a snowy mountain resort, or a sun-soaked villa?  
In Moon Portal, the possibilities are endless.

Every journey begins with a portal.  
Just step through.

[media]

🌀 Portals That Reshape Your Reality

⏳ Time Travel
Pick any place. Choose two years. Then step inside — real 360° Street View panoramas from Google Maps put you there. Glide between past and present, and watch the world transform. 

🪟 Mixed Reality Portals  
Place life-size portals in your room—from sci-fi doors and anime gateways to phone booths and skylights. Walk through each one like it’s really there.

🖼️ 30,000+ Environments  
Explore a vast library of 360° skyboxes and 3D scenes—from peaceful escapes to cinematic worlds inspired by games and films.

[media]
🎢 Bonus Experiences  
- Skywalk: Gravity-defying heights  
- Roller Coaster Island: Speed and joy  
- 360° Movie Mode: Watch films inside immersive scenes via Moon VR Player
[media]
Moon Portal isn’t just a destination — it’s how you live across realities.  
Your portal is waiting.

👾 Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/3wKdfqUydY
